verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying, Snatch them in pity from sin and the grave; Weep o’er the erring one, Lift up the fallen, Tell them of Jesus the mighty to save.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Rescue the perishing, Care for the dying; Jesus is merciful, Jesus will save.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though they are slighting Him, Still He is waiting, Waiting the penitent child to receive; Plead with them earnestly, Plead with them gently, He will forgive if they only believe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Down in the human heart, Crushed by the tempter, Feelings lie buried that grace can restore; Touched by a loving heart, Wakened by kindness, Chords that are broken will vibrate once more.

verse.name: v4
